ComicInfo.Title: Ejection Slip!
ComicInfo.Summary:
Brian launches the ejection seat from Alf's ship with Alf in it. Alf lands somewhere in the Pacific Ocean. Instead of flares, he finds Plair pens. Alf catches a fish and uses the skeleton as a paddle. He spots a tropical island and heads toward it, only to be caught by a sub that surfaces under him. He clings to the periscope as it reveals that the island is actually a secret base, belonging to the Alien Task Force. He hides in a line of models of supposed aliens, one of which resembles ET. He steals a sup, accidentally torpedoing a ship. The rest give chase, but he dives an loses them. He calls Willie on his ham radio and arranges a meeting at a deserted marina.
Alf recounts the tale of the Honeyspooners.
Alf helps Brian learn to play the trumpet
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:39:05. [CVDB56922]
ComicInfo.Characters: ALF, Brian Tanner, Lynn Tanner, Melmackie Gleason, Willie Tanner
